nodes.bodyText: is dynamicField_<%=cid%>.getProp("talend.field.dbColumnName") possible to be null? (in some components)
Yes. It supposes to be null in other components. Since I search the code, it seems no other component is using this variable "DBName".

consider what we have done before. mayben  keep set it to dynamicField_<%=cid%>.name()
when dynamicField_<%=cid%>.getProp("talend.field.dbColumnName") is null.
we can't guarantee customer don't have custom code to handle dynamic.
